mapper.select: select imgNo no, imgName name from band_into_img where imgNo >= #{begin} and imgNo <= #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into band (band_no, band_name, band_photo, band_secret_yn, band_name_open_yn, band_open_yn, user_id) values (band_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{photo}, #{secretYn}, #{nameOpenYn}, ${openYn}, ${user.id})
